title: FS: T3 Variations and Rarities - Rhoades, etc
author: T3s

posts.post_title: FS: T3 Variations and Rarities - Rhoades, etc
posts.post_content:
For sale below are some key variations and rarities from the T3 Turkey Red set.  The McIntyre and Paskert are team variations and a bit harder to find.  The Rhoades and Myers are relative rarities and the Dool"in" variation is easily the toughest T3 to find (with Tenney NY & Bos a very close second).  Pfeister and McFarland included on the list for good measure, as they aren't rare, but available for sale.  As a note, the latest Legendary auction offered a complete set, card by card, and the only card not offered was the Dool"in" variation.  I am happy to send front and back scans, will consider offers and volume discounts as well.


28. McIntyre - Brookln & Chic - PSA-5(MK) - beautiful card, tiny mark - $450
33. Pfeister - raw, extra clean, no creases, would probably grade PSA-4 - $325
50. Chief Myers at Bat - SGC-40 - difficult card - $450
90. Dool"in" - rare variation - toughest card in set, erased pencil on back - PSA-4(MK) - $1250
112. Paskert - Cin & Phil - PSA-3  - great card $350
114. Rhoades - pinhole, otherwise a gem, rarest "regular issue" card in set - $650
58. McFarland (T9 boxer) - PSA-3 - $250
